content:
257 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
    (i) NDU as in Accountancy for Business Management option 
accepts 'O' level credit passes in Commerce or 
economics for Office Management Technology;   
            'O' level credit pass in AgriculturalScience or Biology 
for Agriculture Education and Home Economics 
Education.  
    (ii)  EKSU accepts a pass in NCE General English in lieu of 'O' 
level credit pass in English Language.  
    (iii)  UNIOSUN requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes   in 
relevant subjects or their equivalents at not more than 
two (2) sittings in addition to an acceptable pass in the 
UTME.  
    (iv)  EBSU requires five (5)'O' level credit passesfor 
Technology Option in English Language, Mathematics, 
Physics or Chemistry and two (2) otherScience 
subjects. For AgricultureOptionfive (5) 'O'level credit 
passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology or 
AgricultureScience and two (2) other relevant subjects 
and a pass in Chemistry.  
    (v)  AAU accepts 'O' level pass in Mathematics for 
Secretarial Education.  
    (vi)  ESUTECH requires  
    a)  For Technicalfive (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Physics or Chemistry and 
three (3) other relevant subjects.  
    b)  For Accounting/Commerce and Cooperative, five (5) 
'O' level credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Economics or Commerce and Principle 
of Accounts, plus one (1) other relevant subject.  
    c)  For Agriculture, five (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, and Chemistry, Agricultural 
Science or Geography and one (1) other relevant 
subject.
